name: Sunset Showdown
description:
Programmed for Controllers only! Sorry!

Controls:

A to Jump/Double Jump/Wall Jump

X to Attack

How to Play:

Your goal is to destroy the other player's wall by escorting your minions to their wall 10 times. Minions grow stronger every time you kill the other player. Potions at the top of the screen heal the player to full and the special potion in the middle doubles the player's attack damage.  

Credits: 

Sean Porio - Music

Kevin Ray - Everything Else

One of my first game projects, thanks for playing!
